name: BizCapital
overview:
Unlike traditional lenders, BizCapital looks at the complete picture of your business - not just the balance sheet. BizCapital invests in people, not numbers. BizCapital is a non-depository financial institution offering competitive loans to small- and medium-sized companies.

In partnership with the federal government, BizCapital is licensed to make government-guaranteed SBA and USDA loans.

Since its inception in 1999, BizCapital has made nearly $140 million in loans to businesses in a variety of industries, helping to stimulate business growth and economic activity.

BizCapitalâ€™s parent company is Advantage Capital Partners, a venture capital and small business finance firm that invests in promising companies located in areas underserved by traditional venture capital. Since 1992, Advantage has raised more than $1 billion in institutional capital and has invested in a wide variety of companies and business ventures.
